fullText: Despite handsome design elements and a score with pleasing melodies, this ambitious musical adaptation of Dickens' classic novel suffers from a bloated book that fails to dramatize effectively.
dtliExcerpt: Despite handsome design elements and a score with pleasing melodies, this ambitious musical adaptation of Dickens' classic novel suffers from a bloated book that fails to dramatize effectively.
